Package org.tantalum.util

Class Summary
ImageUtils Only one image processing routine will be active at a time.
L Utility class for logging.
LengthLimitedVector A collection which calls lengthExceeded() when the designated maximum size is reached.
LRUVector Least recently used list of object Each object can be in the Vector a maximum of one time.
PoolingWeakHashCache Objects stored in the WeakRefernce hash table may be garbage collected at any time if the phone needs more memory.
PoolingWeakImageHashCache Keep recent instances of images all of which are the same size in memory.
SortedVector A collection which continuously maintains sort order
SortedVector.Comparator A helper class to indicate the sort order for the Vector with the given current data type
StringUtils Utility methods for String handling
WeakHashCache This is a hashtable which acts as a heap memory cache using WeakReference.
